job.title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
This Jobot Job is hosted by Dylan Currier
Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button and sending us your resume.
Salary $140,000 - $180,000 per year
We are an early stage startup in the Bay Area that is utilizing machine data to deliver critical information. We make sure people are safe by taking advantage of IoT and sensor data. Our goal is to help improve lives and make sure that everyone is safe at all times.
As a member of our team, your work will be at a global presence impacting the lives of millions. We are looking for someone who is excited about making a global impact at scale!
We are a fast growing startup and have a strong engineering presence here in Silicon Valley. We have executives who have worked at top tech companies and attended top universities.
We offer a generous amount of equity and pay competitive salaries!
Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button.
